values:
I'm a little scared to be honest.

if you read this I'm sure you know I had depression until about four years ago i'm now worried its coming back. I've sort help and I relatively possitive about it that is until this afternoon.

I got back from the GP this afternoon after waiting three weeks to see them (WTF) and when I opened the packet of my perscription I was horrified. I've heard all the horror stories about seroxat and never would agreed to the perscription had I known thats what he was giving me. Having read a few things online I'm now even more scared. This stuff is really hard to come off 

I really dont want to take it but I'm worried if I dont my GP isnt going to take me seriously. I know what i need that a little CBT and maybe a little bit of group to help me through my final year of uni and through job hunting beyond that 

Charlotte
P.S if you read this its more to do with me wanting to record this in someway I'm not trying to illcit sympathy/responses

Arrrrh Grumph! I had found this really cute sailor suit esque victorian womens jacket for my project but my tutor wants me to do the boring blue military style jacket. It has got lovely brading on it though. 

I also have to make a corset. I wish I'd known that before I could have arranged someone to make it for. the thing is now its too late. well I could make it for someone they'd have to come round for fitting and measureing though in the week of the 10th May with a fitting possibly on 18th May

Shes also been a cow today making me redo my button holes Four times today and those where only the samples. I know she right but I cant help but feel shes grumpy about it. 

Also Im writing the sickest jokes atm my latest tweet reads 

"You know you shouldn't be going to a theatre uni when your reaction to another redgrave death is: Oh well, three down two to go"

I know wrong but I cant stand the redgraves especially vanesssa did you see her on the baftas bowing and scraping to that twat prince william. Shes come along way from her workers revolutionary party days hasnt she stupid cow. anyway enough bile for the day.

Also theres no Tom and Alex  on triple j ( Australia equalent to 6music) to listen to they usually keep me cheerful in the face of adversity

One positive note the theme for the end of year exhibition is tea party which rocks and I get to work on it Yay me. bring it on I say

Im being distracted by all forms of social networking/media most of its in the forms of tweets from comedians at MelbourneICF ( how I wish i where in melbourne right now). I'm also bieng distracted by all the things I want to buy.

I'm not like most girls who seem to use shopping as therapy. I'm generally too busy or too lazy to go shopping but the truth is really really hate it as it reminds me how abnormal I am. I go on these buying binges one or twice a year. I've already brought five cute if a little boring tops and a M&S black cashmere cardigan but my current objects of desire are:

This stud detail cardigan which i'd like to wear josh thomas prep style with a punky twist



and these cute wedge shoes

Which have a 4.5 inch heal eeeek I can barely walk in 3inch heals but they are so nice and they could well help me achieve my personal goal of walking in 3 inch heels by September. Yes I know thats as sad goal to have.

They will all look cute with this 40's/50's couture inspired straight skirt I'm working on too.

anyway enought for now I have to rewrite an essay which I mistakenly allowed my mother to edit/butcher.

i need to hurry up and finish it cause this:
http://www.schuh.co.uk/irregular-choice/black-and-grey-irregular-choice-alphabite-button-clutch/7506167140/
is my reward

I decided to take on a screen printing project this term its turned into a massive pain in the arse and i wish i had never started it.  My Uni has no screen printing Facilities no screen printing ink or materials so I'm having to do it all off my own back which means I'm making lots of stupid mistakes, Using the wrong mediums doing things in the wrong way lah lah lah.  the worse thing about it is I only did it because  the other project I was going to work on didnt happen. and I didnt want to work  on another show especially because that would have been the musical  and generally I HATE MUSICALS

On a nicer note next terms project is promising to be a good one I'm writting a longer essay titled "Military themes in Victorian Womenswear" and I'm making a Victorian jacket. No Designer, No Fittings, No Actors, No stupid people changing there minds.

Why the f**k do i do this to myself.

 im doing a printing project inspried by Sonia Delaunay but the printing bit isnt going well at all. right now its making me want to chuck myself off the nearest balcony and everyone in cosutme is making me feek guilty for bring paint into the room which is they are totally justified in doing but its making me feel even worse cause i know i can feel annoyed at them plus the textile medium I brought is making the fabric really stiff so I'm not happy at all

arrrrrrrrh!

I've got my laptop back after two months at the menders who knew a few mls of soy sauce could do that much damage (£800s worth) thank god for insurance.  

I'm dyslexic so i find writing and reading really hard and not having a laptop with all its dsylexia software to help me has been like having a limb missing. No seriously I had all these ideas  with only my ipod to input them onto has been pretty sucky.

I actually got asked this today well minus the swear word but I love to embelish. I was a little dumstruck not because I cant believe everyone doesnt love twitter as much as I do but beause I couldn't think of convincing answer.

I know twitter is kinda sad but it gives me randon stuff to laugh @ on trains & buses which makes me happy.

I was awake for 20 hours yesterday 3am til 11pm and as my tutor is so fond of telling me "Thats what its like in Costume" its almost her catchphrase its the answer to everything 

Me:  Caroline I've only had four hours sleep I'm too tired to show people round the Uni
Caroline: Thats what its like in Costume 
Me: Caroline are sew I cant sew anymore my fingers are bleeding
Caroline: Yes you can Thats Costume
Me Caroline the designer repeatedly beats me around the head
C: Thats Costume!
Me: She chasing after me with an axe she wants to kill me.
C: I refer you to my Previous answer.

I apend most of today just the everchange blouse collar again this thing has been the baine of my existance.it took me a whole day to unpick it re sew it and then sew four popers on it to oh Joy

I feel so Fucking out of it today. Ive been making for a production for the last four-ish weeks, working like a beast of burden doing 10 -13.5 hour days. I got up at three this morning so I could fix the costume and now Im sitting in tech doing nothing and it's driving me spare  I really hate technical rehearsals they walkthough the same piece of the play again and again and we have to stay incase anything is needed I sick of it at least today I have my laptop with me.

I haven't watched  tele , listen to proper radio (ie not heart or magic)or looked at the Internet for the last four weeks or looked at a newspaper or a news website so. The end of the world could be coming and I'd know nothing about it arrrrrrh   SO SICK OF COSTUME

Oh joy central sucked me into its whirling vortex again 

Central is driving me totally  fucking nuts at the moment I've been put up for strand rep in conjunction with another person but i really don't want to do it any more i cant be asked to get involve with the politics of this place. I accepted partly out of vanity partly and partly because i felt cornered but this place has me beat already do i really want to give central another stick to beat me with. I've got a possible way out but that involves me finding someone else from one of the other courses to take over.

I have to make a coat , jacket, skirt and blouse in three weeks my teacher thinks i can do it but I that would involve me working every weekend and every night between now and the perfomance. I really dont want to t

feel like going on a massive go slow and just not doing it I also feel the same about my essay i really shouldn't have come back but the alternatives aren't much better.

I'm resurrecting this journal mostly so i moan about uni and have space to help me attempt to write. hope you dont mind it wont be entirely morose i promise. Oh and i might use it to post picture of what i'm making atm


Charlotte

Anyone who tells you students are layabouts should come to central. I've only been back two weeks and exhaustion has already set in.  

Today they drop a bombshell on us at 4.30pm Our first costume fitting for this terms public production is on Fucking Tuesday!!!! to quote Jerry Springer the Opera "What the F**k, What the F**K What the F**king,F**ky, F**K" and for this glorious fitting we need to toile all our garments! thats three working days to pattern cut and make a skirt, jacket and blouse. OH F**king Joy another term of NO WEEKENDS and 12 HOUR Plus Days. 

So I abandon My 18th C Corset  and spend my evening making a Skirt Block, a Bodice Block and a Classic Coat Block. I still need to make a sleeve block for the bodice and coat block but they can wait.

I feel like Im in some bizarre Sado-Masocistic relationship. They turn me into a pack animal, deprive me of sleep, Stick pins and other assorted blunt metal objects in me, Burn my flesh with hot irons and what is more make me pay £3,225 for the privilege, not that I'll ever earn enough to ever pay it back LOL.

On the bright side I am developing a really evil sense of humour. I want to emblazon the slogan "Work Makes You Free" above the door of our workroom but I know someone wont see the funny side and I'll get bollocked for it.
Its a friday evening and what am I doing I uploading a whole load of old CDs on to my ipod god my life is dull at times.

I fucking passed every single module this term and I think the ones from last term Yippie 

Sorry about the ultra long hiatus (yes neomo I did nick that from you) but I've been totally focused on college over the last three months its been hell and I've had to confront all my demons but I've done it and I can relax a bit more now. I'll post up some pics of my work if any of you guys are interested some of it is pretty good even if I say so myself I did a costume inspired by a lobster and a folio of textiles inspired by japan. 

I've actually really missed you guys and I'm looking forward to getting back in touch with you all.

Hugs 
Charlotte

I'm 99% certain none of you reading this will know who he is but Nigel Kneale has just died  this man was such an amazing writer with so much skill, talent and imagination his work helped shaped British television.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/6105578.stm

tribute by Mark Gatiss (league of gentlemen)
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/6107564.stm

IMDB listing
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0460600/

I cant take complements or praise at all I just don't know how to deal with it.It makes me very uncomfortable and I would rather people are just non committal or down right disparaging. I had my first tutorial yesterday I expected it to suck but my teacher was really complimentary this was like a smack in the face with a wet fish I want expecting it all I was expecting her to shout at me for not working hard enough but instead she was really complimentary. Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrgh why I am I so mad in the head so fucked-up I felt really weird afterwards. I feel really crap because half my classes are a real struggle I'm a crap drawer lets face it and I'm not really an artist I just like making things.

okay this isn't a sympathy seeking post I can be asked to disable comments because sometimes that's just as attention seek as keeping them enabled. This is more of a record for myself kind of help me put it behind me so I'm putting it under a cut.

<lj-cut text="panic attack">
Today I had what has to be my worst ever panic attack even thought that would have been quite easy to achieve I know it was still a really extreme one I still feel quite shaky even though its been about six hours since it happened and I've subsequently been to my group and talked about it.

today was one of those really bad really good days. In the morning I had fashion drawing and everything seemed to go wrong I got paint on my wool skirt drew loads of really dreadful drawings then I did fuck all in my afternoon class. After classes I was having a great funny chat with a friend then I had my appointment with the learning support teacher for help with my dyslexia which was actually really great even if some of the test where really hard. We where doing reading exercises which I find really hard then she gave me a sheet of yellow acetate to put over my work and what previously looked like a swirling mess suddenly looked really clear and much easier to read. I this was really great but it made me cry cause I something so simple could have such a miraculous almost magical result. It also made me cry because I've struggled for years of anxiety,angst and anger with this shit.When I left college I was standing on the Holloway Rd and I've lost my travelcard so I decide go to the nearest safe place my parents house I'm sitting on the bus snuffling away feeling a bit sorry for myself. 

By the time I get to my parents road I'm starting to hyperventilate it was getting worse and worse I'm standing in the middle of the road having a really bad panic attack gasping for breathing hopping to god that nobody passes me and thinks OMG look at that fat cow she so fat she cant even walk down the street with out getting out of breathe or even worse someone stopping to help me cause I look like I'm choking or dying or something. When I get to my parents door its just getting worse I barely manage to focus enough to knock on their door and out that its me they open the door and I collapse in the hall way I cant  breathe, I cant see properly, my chest is pounding and I cant speak they're panicking cause they think something serious has happened they've never seen me in the midst of an attack of anxiety even the mild kind they think I'm seriously ill or I've been attacked it seemed like several minutes before I could get myself calm enough to breathless tell them I'm having a panic attack. My dads freaking out he didn't even now I get panic attacks let alone knowing anything about them. Thank God I knew what it was and am familiar enough with the symptoms of panics to know this is whats happening otherwise it would have been even more fucking scary. 

Im still feeling fucking shaky and absolutely exhausted.
</lj-cut>

My Space does my head in it never works especially when you need it too. Today I found an old friend on myspace completely by accident I havent seen them for at about five years and all I want to do its to leave them a message but the fucking thing aint working.Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrh! the things is this happens all the time

On the eve of the eve of Foundation in textiles and fashion I'm terrified I'm not artistic or talented enough Its not self doubt its just I've never really explored how creative I am what if I look inside me and there's nothing there?

The "war on terror" - and by terrorists - has directly killed a minimum of
62,006 people, created 4.5 million refugees and cost the US more than the
sum needed to pay off the debts of every poor nation on earth.

If estimates of other, unquantified, deaths - of insurgents, the Iraq
military during the 2003 invasion, those not recorded individually by
Western media, and those dying from wounds - are included, then the toll
could reach as high as 180,000.

I havent told anyone  this but part of the crap of last week was I got a baliffs letter about council tax which happened because of there incompetence not mine (well they did send me forms but I wasnt well so there) It got even scarier when I got the DWP letter arrived because if I'm not on benefits theres nothing I can do about the baliffs.

Anyway hopefully now its sorted and my family are back so I'm feeling a bit better.

By this time next year I would like to have done the following

1) Got a job
2) Gone to the 2007 Edinburgh festival.
3) Got some kind of work experience.
4) Got myself on a better financial footing.
5) Felt well enough to start flat sharing again to let my spare room (this will help me through uni).
6) Got into University.

I've decided to appeal the DWP's decession to deny me income support but in the mean time I've had to apply for jobseekers allowence too even though I'm not really able to work. but my family dont support me in this appeal but then they dont really understand how ill I have been.

The thing is I want a job I really would like to work but I know looking for a job would leave me suicidal ( I wrote to the DWP and told them this) I dont want to be thrown in at the deep end and be made to get a full time job  or part time job with college and then get sacked because I'm too depressed to work.

I know I have to get a job this year and have always know that (especially if I want to go to uni) but i want to do the search at my own pace with help from my psychiatrist ad the the DWP I know they do give help. i dont want to go back to my doctor I dont want to go on anti depressents again they didnt do me much good when I did take them they made me more anxcious. 

My family think that because I was relitively sucessful at college last year that I'm okay enough to work but the thing is that college wasn't like work for starters its only half and hour from my house secondly It never a full day and but for the kindness of alot of my teachers I wouldnt have passed.  I also missed alot of college about 10-20% of my classes because I was ill or too anxcious to leave home.

The odd thing is my parents have offered to help me fincially through my Foundation which is really great of them but it kind misses the point.

Right now I want to be hugged so hard I cant breathe.

Yesterday I got a letter from the DWP telling me my claim for income support is going to stop because they don't think I'm not ill enough at the moment I haven't stopped crying since this happened.

I want to die I feel like someone's pulled the rug from under me. My psychiatrist is away my family are going away from tomorrow morning and I feel so alone.

if these vids don't make you squeal or go Awwww you're a dead unfeeling evil bastard or you just dont like cats but his kittys so vunerable and cute even cat haters cant help going aww

http://vids.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=1046427434

http://vids.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=1082370363

http://vids.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=1091852617

This might shock a few people but I'm getting a bit tired of being so focused on Gothic Lolita I rarely wear it  atm and like Mod which I was into before its a little restrictive and as I need to broaden my creative horizons if I'm to do well this year I might leave it for a while. I might take some time out of the scene and find a caretaker webmaster for avantgauche.co.uk it would have to be someone i could trust anyone on my friends list fancy the task?

http://www.iconmovies.co.uk/bettiepage/

Its a really great movie. I went to see it today with my sister because I really love 40's & 50's pin-up art and I the photos I've seen of her are really beautiful. Although It does  turn your image of what you imagine she was like on its head. Its great because its not just a saucy film its really intelligent and really makes you think while being really entertaining its got a fantastic female cast it beautifully shot  and Gretchen Mole who plays Betty is really gorgeous.

My only criticism of the film is that it left me wanting to know more about what she was actually like both as a child and after she stopped modelling.

If you love the Images of pin up art like Vargas Girls and Betty Page then you have to see this movie.

quote from last nights newsnight
"It now transpires that bottles of pop are suspect, MI6 must have just
seen the Tango ads and thought 'whoo, that looks dangerous'. This is
sounding more and more like a farce, dressed up by the government to
frighten old ladies into not flying. Meanwhile, in Lebanon ..."
that sums it up really

not cause of the absolutely minuscule risk of being involved in a terrorist attack but because of these stupid new rules they're imposing on hand luggage Jesus they are just plain ridiculous 

new security measure include no hand luggage no bottles cases or packages of any kind (except for essential medication) no electronic equipment of any kind that includes mobile phone, music players etc.

basically your only allowed to take are your passport, ticket, money and keys (as long as they're not electronic) and enough medicine supplies for the flight including sanitary products which have to be unpackaged and baby food which must all be tasted upon check in by the passenger and those are only the new restrictions on luggage.

Will these marvellous new restrictions on our freedom prevent terror attacks? No of course not their not even proportionate to the risk we face and whats going to happen when they foil the next attack?What's next were all going to have to be handcuffed to our seats!

in the end the thing that annoys me is that this is so symptomatic of whats going on our rights are being eroded on every front in the name of security which we don't really need.its not going to stop terrorism it probably wont stop them trying to blow us up its just going If they had discovered a new aeroplane safety feature that would save as many if not more lives do you think they'd be in a rush to do it no it all just hysteria

http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/14252208

shocking and quite chilling really

my friends list is so quiet the only person really posting are like milk and rosenchaos. 

Its still too hot here 34C today but the 5 day forcast says it going to be 24-25C this weekend and rainy too *schreeks with delight* If the forcast holds out Im going to go to the west end on saturday and the tate britain on sunday and if the weather last into next week I've got to go to tate britain too. Oh please let this be the end of it. I dont want to spend my holiday feeling horrible and uncomfortable. I dont think this is the end of it though I have a horrible sinking feeling it going to last till september bluuuuuurgh

I actually managed to go out yesterday first thing in the morning though went and brought food and some more fabric I brought some summery black anglaise cheesecloth which will be a nice long skirt.

I have quite a few ideas of things I want to make one is for a flare grey skirt with appliqued skulls in loads of different coloured fabrics all piled on top of each other I have the main fabric I almost have the pattern and the applique design nicked from G&LB extra vol 2 but I just need the fabric Oh yeah and my new machine cause if i asked my current machine to do it I think it might die, poor little pet lamb I've had it for about eight years and it was a little cheepy as well its lasted pretty well bless it.

I cant stand this everything just feels like one massive waiting game till september. Right now I'm bored, tired and far to fucking hot. I cant be arsed to do anything at all. Today my big adventure into the outside world was supposed to be me going and shopping for food but I didnt go I stayed at home and did fuck all! WTF I cant manage to do anything at the moment not even sewing. 

I'm house sitting in a very tall house I'm rattling around in it and I think being away from all my distracting comforts like my computer doesnt help my sewing machines are here but I dont really have anywhere comfortable to set them up. 

Also I cant bring myself to cook or eat all I do is drink thought that might have something to do with it.


August looks like its going to turn into one long film four marathon.

last night I watched 
Team America - utter crap
and memoirs of a geisha which to be honest although it was pretty I found the DVD extras more interesting than the movie

Tonight I'm going to watch 
Brazil by Terry Gilliam.
and 
Dark Habits by Pedro Almodavar 
I think that the only film of his I havent actually seen expect for any shorts he may have made 

Monday is 
Duck Soup 

see what I mean!

(Click here to post your own answers for this meme.)

× I miss somebody right now. ✓ I don't watch much TV these days. ✓ I own lots of books.  (I buy way too many fashion and art books)
× I wear glasses or contact lenses. × I love to play video games.  (I'm so crap at them) ✓ I've tried marijuana.
✓ I've watched porn movies. × I have been the psycho-ex in a past relationship. × I believe honesty is usually the best policy.
✓ I curse sometimes.  (too much) ✓ I have changed a lot mentally over the last year.  (well considering a year ago I could barely get out of bedbecause I was so depressed) × I carry my knife/razor everywhere with me.
* * * * *
× I have broken someone's bones. ✓ I have a secret that I am ashamed to reveal. × I hate the rain.
✓ I'm paranoid at times.  (paricularly with new people) × I would get plastic surgery if it were 100% safe, free of cost, and scar-free.  (yes) ✓ I need/want money right now.
✓ I love sushi. × I talk really, really fast. × I have fresh breath in the morning.
× I have long hair. × I have lost money in Las Vegas. ✓ I have at least one sibling.  (older sister)
✓ I was born in a country outside of the U.S. ✓ I have worn fake hair/fingernails/eyelashes in the past.  (wore fake eyelashes once) × I couldn't survive without Caller I.D.
× I like the way that I look. × I have lied to a good friend in the last 6 months. ✓ I am usually pessimistic.
✓ I have a lot of mood swings. ✓ I think prostitution should be legalized. × I slept with a roommate.  (I somtimes wish I had)
× I have a hidden talent. × I'm always hyper no matter how much sugar I have. × I have a lot of friends.
× I have pecked someone of the same sex. × I enjoy talking on the phone. × I practically live in sweatpants or PJ pants.
× I love to shop and/or window shop. × I'm obsessed with my Xanga or Livejournal. × I'm completely embarrassed to be seen with my mother.
✓ I have a mobile phone. × I have passed out drunk in the past 6 months.  (I havent drunk in well over a year) ✓ I've rejected someone before.
× I currently like/love someone. × I have no idea what I want to do for the rest of my life. × I want to have children in the future.
× I have changed a diaper before. × I've called the cops on a friend before. × I'm not allergic to anything.  (I'm alergic to asprin)
✓ I have a lot to learn. × I am shy around the opposite sex. × I'm online 24/7, even as an away message.
× I have at least 5 away messages saved. × I have tried alcohol or drugs before. × I have made a move on a friend's significant other or crush in the past.
× I own the "South Park" movie. × I have avoided assignments at work/school to be on Xanga or Livejournal. × I enjoy some country music.
× I would die for my best friends. × I'm obsessive, and often a perfectionist.  (no I never think things I've done are good enough but thats bot being a perfectionist because I giv in to easily) × I have used my sexuality to advance my career.
× I think Halloween is awesome because you get free candy. × I have dated a close friend's ex. × I am happy at this moment.
× I'm obsessed with guys. × Democrat. × Republican.
× I don't even know what I am. ✓ I am punk rockish. × I go for older guys/girls, not younger.
× I study for tests most of the time. × I tie my shoelaces differently from anyone I've ever met. × I can work on a car.
× I love my job(s). × I am comfortable with who I am right now. × I have more than just my ears pierced.
✓ I walk barefoot wherever I can. × I have jumped off a bridge. × I love sea turtles.
× I spend ridiculous amounts of money on makeup. ✓ I plan on achieving a major goal/dream. × I am proficient on a musical instrument.
× I hate office jobs. × I went to college out of state. × I am adopted.
× I am a pyro. × I have thrown up from crying too much. × I have been intentionally hurt by people that I loved.
× I fall for the worst people. × I adore bright colours.  (I hate them) × I usually like covers better than originals.
✓ I hate chain theme restaurants like Applebees and TGIFridays. × I can pick up things with my toes. × I can't whistle.
✓ I have ridden/owned a horse. × I still have every journal I've ever written in. × I talk in my sleep.
× I've often thought that I was born in the wrong century. ✓ I try to forget things by drowning them out with loads of distractions. × I wear a toe ring.
× I have a tattoo.  (I dont really like them I have considered scarification) × I can't stand at LEAST one person that I work with. × I am a caffeine junkie.
× I am completely tree-huggy spiritual, and I'm not ashamed at all. × If I knew I would get away with it, I would commit at least one murder. × I will collect anything, and the more nonsensical, the better.
× I enjoy a nice glass of wine with dinner. × I'm an artist. × I am ambidextrous.
× I sleep with so many stuffed animals, I can hardly fit on my bed. × If it weren't for having to see other people naked, I'd live in a nudist colony. ✓ I have terrible teeth.  (well not terrible just not great)
✓ I hate my toes.  (my feet are ugggggggggleeeeeeeeeeeeee) ✓ I did this meme even though I wasn't tagged by the person who took it before me. × I have more friends on the internet than in real life.
× I have lived in either three different states or countries.  (nope I've always lived in london) × I am extremely flexible. × I love hugs more than kisses.
× I want to own my own business. × I smoke. ✓ I spend way too much time on the computer than on anything else.
✓ Nobody has ever said I'm normal. ✓ Sad movies, games, and the like can cause a trickle of tears every now and then. × I am proficient in the use of many types of firearms and combat weapons.
✓ I like the way women look in stylized men's suits. ✓ I don't like it when people are unpleased or seem unpleased with me. ✓ I have been described as a dreamer or likely to have my head up in the clouds.
× I have played strip poker with someone else before. ✓ I have had emotional problems for which I have sought professional help. × I believe in ghosts and the paranormal.
× I can't stand being alone.  (I love it) × I have at least one obsession at any given time. × I weigh myself, pee/poo, and then weigh myself again.
✓ I consistently spend way too much money on obsessions-of-the-moment. × I'm a judgmental asshole. × I'm a HUGE drama-queen.
✓ I have travelled on more than one continent. ✓ I sometimes wish my father would just disappear. ✓ I need people to tell me I'm good at something in order to feel that I am.
✓ I am a Libertarian.  (I'm consider myself to be a bit of a libertine but then again that depends on which dictionary I look at) × I can speak more than one language. ✓ I can fall asleep even if the whole room is as noisy as it can be.
× I would rather read than watch TV. × I like reading fact more than fiction. ✓ I have pulled an all-nighter on an assignment I was given a month to do.
✓ I have no piercings. × I have spent the night in a train station or other public place. × I have been so upset over my physical gender that I cried.
× I once spent Christmas completely alone because there was a miscommunication on which parent was supposed to have me that night. × There have been times when I have wondered "Why was I born?" and may/may not have cried over it. × I like most animals better than most people.
× I own a collection of retro games consoles. × The thought of physical exercise makes me shiver. × I have hit someone with a dead fish.
× I am compulsively honest. ✓ I was born with a congenital birth defect that has never been repaired.  (dyslexia and lack of mobilty in myleft hip joint) × I have danced topless in front of dozens of complete strangers.

Oh my god what have I got myself into for my textiles course I have loads of coursework reasearch to justify my final piece of work. the original theme of the project was native americans. and when we went to the british museum to have a look at there work I saw a really lovely squaws dress which had been decorated with elks teeth 

it really captured my imagination and I was inspired by it to make something similar for a modern american women and I decided to design something 1950's inspired but instead of being for a squaw it would be for a airforce wife I was going to design fifties style dress made from blue gingham decorated with her husband Kills in much the same way as they used to do on WW2 bombers and fighters but I dont want to decorate a skirt with bombs symbols cause that would be tooo obvious and boring so I'm or embleshing the dress with atomic mushroom clouds and atomic symbols  

The problem is the research I have to do to back this up is huge

I got three nice things in the post yesterday two parcels of books one from amazon which was some fashion books and a copy of kamikaze girls finally got a copy then I got another from japan which was a copy of the gothic, lolita & punk brand book There was also a from college to say that I've been given an unconditional offer of a place on the fashion and textiles foundation course next year! WooooooooooooooooooooooHooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo! this was soooo what i wanted its going to be a great course the teachers are really great and whats more I get to be a creative bumb(the the american sense of the word) for the next year.

Wow I actually feel really good at the moment I'm working really hard and I'm enjoying it. I worked really hard all day yesterday and it felt really really good. Since I left that tailoring course I've been so happy its amazing I just didnt realise how stressed and anxcious it was making me and how miserable I was over all that stuff. I think it was a case of not realising my limitations I'm fine when I'm doing one course and can devote my energy to that but doing two wasnt a good Idea. I was always tired allways overworked depressed anytime that wasnt spent working I spent feeling miserable about work. 

I'm sure your sick of this now so this is going to be my last post on the matter. I promise.
